trans-unit.source: Provides information about a running application.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关运行的应用程序信息。

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationInfo object is used by the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager> class for information about running applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ApplicationInfo 对象<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>有关运行应用程序信息的类。</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: For applications running under Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS), the application ID is the metabase path to the application root, such as /LM/W3SVC/1/Root/application.
trans-unit.target: 对于运行 Microsoft Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 下的应用程序，应用程序 ID 是应用程序的根目录中，如 /LM/W3SVC/1/Root/application 的元数据库路径。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the application specified when the application was created by using the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject*> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用创建应用程序时指定的应用程序的唯一标识符<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject*>方法。</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path corresponding to the application's root.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于应用程序的根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The PhysicalPath property is the path that was passed to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A> method when the application was created.
trans-unit.target: PhysicalPath 属性是传递到的路径<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法创建应用程序时。</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The physical path corresponding to the application's root.
trans-unit.target: 对应于应用程序的根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path corresponding to the application's root.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于应用程序的根目录的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The VirtualPath property is the virtual path that was passed to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A> method when the application was created.
trans-unit.target: VirtualPath 属性是传递到的虚拟路径<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法创建应用程序时。</xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The virtual path corresponding to the application's root.
trans-unit.target: 对应于应用程序的根目录的虚拟路径。
